title: Cumberland Island National Seashore: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger       Junior Ranger Program  Learn about Cumberland Island by becoming a Junior Ranger. Junior Ranger booklets have activities that are island based for ages 5-12.  Junior ranger books are free to any visitor and are available at the Sea Camp Ranger Station, Dungeness Dock, and the Mainland Visitor Center. After completing the activities on the island, check with a ranger at Sea Camp or the Dungeness Dock to receive your Junior Ranger badge. Web Ranger  Be a Jr. Ranger even if you are not able to visit a National Park. Click here to login to the National Park Service Web Ranger site.
